member.name: T:CustomMainMenusAPI.MainMenuObject
member.summary: This is the class from the api, which holds the data necessary for the main menu changes. Use its static methods to create an instance of this object.

member.name: M:CustomMainMenusAPI.MainMenuObject.CreateMenuObject(System.String,UnityEngine.Sprite,SoundObject,System.String)
member.summary: This method will create an instance of the class and automatically register it to the api.
member.param: The *localized* name of the menu to be displayed in the options.
The new image that the menu will use.
The speech that the menu will have (like BBCR does).
The new song that the menu will have (must be midi).

member.param: The *localized* name of the menu to be displayed in the options.
